author: Jessica Maberry
comment: For whatever reason... Roku decided to put the shortest cord ever on the remote receiver. Therefore it doesn't reach long enough from the outlet to the top or aide of my t.v.. It barely pokes around the side and sits inbyhe floor....To use the standard remote, one must awkwardly position themselves directly in the path of the remote receiver and point the remote right at it. Such a pain when I am comfy and don't wanna move from my side of the bed, reach across hubby and point the remote. With the app, I can be in another room and click away and the signal is perfect every time... No more awkward reaching of remotes.

author: Fran Chartres
comment: Had the free app which was fine. Paid extra to get all the premium features and it doesn't work. No tv tab (as per screenshots) at all. I've tried reinstalling, refreshing etc as per troubleshooting faq. Still doesn't work. I'd like refund or better than that - a fix. UPDATE Victor - I saw you'd mentioned this option to someone else so tried that and it still doesn't work. Makes a beeping nose and a volume - and + appears on the screen but doesn't actually change the volume :( UPDATE 2 - Ok. Thank you. I've already submitted a refund request via google and they confirmed a refund is on the way. Will amend my rating as the free app works well. Cheers for trying to fix for me.

reply.author: TinyByte Apps
reply.content: ok, that means your Roku doesn't support volume control. Please send me your receipt and I'll refund it -Victor. tinybyteapps@gmail.com

author: Katrina Roman
comment: Super easy to use. Literally downloaded the app and started using. I thought it was gna be shper complicated to set up and that id end up deletinf the app after 30vseconds but within 30 seconds it just worked. Idk how it works or how it knows but it works and thats all i care about. Dope!

author: Simanta Das
comment: I downloaded the free app. I was kind of forced to pay for the pro version. I don't mind paying but I am unable to do one thing for which I paid - search with the keyboard entry on YouTube. Very disappointing. Now I want my money back.

author: Barbara Nagle
comment: I received a Roku Stick for Christmas over 2 years ago. The remote never worked right. It usually took at least 10 minutes to turn the Roku on with the remote and I often spent 20-30 minutes of frustration without luck. I finally gave up the other day after 45 minutes of failure and threw the remote out. In desparation I searched for another way to turn the Roku on and I found this RoByte app. Let's just say that I am ecstatic. It works PERFECTLY. I read the problems that other people were having with volume. I am able to adjust the volume with the tv remote. There is no problem. This RoByte app is wonderful! Thank you!

author: Danny Hoofe
comment: I purchased the full version to have the additional features however none of them work - the volume doesn't work, there is no additional TV tab as per the screenshots. The free version worked fine, but this doesn't. Very disappointing. I would like a refund.

author: Thakshak Gudimetla
comment: Asking to purchase immediately after typing each alphabet on the keyboard. Got me frustrated.

author: Jean Rodriguez
comment: This app is awesome. Always connects easily to the roku. I dont like the roku controller. This is nice for switching between channels very fast. Also can be using my tablet and changing what "im watching".

author: Caroline Lane
comment: Love it for the convience. However sometimes it lags terribly, or can be unresponsive.

author: Krystine MARAT
comment: It's kinda slow and I wish u could do the volume.. but once it's connected good. Works just fine :)

author: Elliot Borin
comment: Absolute trash… .the developers add insult to injury by claiming it needs no setup. They're sittn' on the dock of the Bay LOLing I'm  sure.  Will not find my Roku Premier or Stick automatically,  will not connect to either with IPs entered manually… well,  yes ,  there are a few hundred words worth of workarounds for this particular "no setup required" situation,  but why bother…  virtually all the other Roku remote apps from the official factory one down to the lowly two and three star ones find both units flawlessly and work perfectly within the limits of their individual designs This one claims more bells and whistles… but,  golly whiz, folks it could claim to transport you to Mars and as long as it refuses to connect to anything you couldn't prove it wrong.
This seems to work well after weeks of problems withe remote. Better than buying a new Roku stick.

I always have my phone near me and my kids always leave the roku remote laying around somewhere. This app is nice because if I'm nursing the baby on the couch and forgot to grab the roku remote I can just use this app and still get to watch my show while I feed the baby

author: Jocelyn Borbon
comment: This app sucks when it says set up there is setup idk if it was opposite day when whoever made this app but the is setup that is why I hated this app

author: Allan Hobbs
comment: Works perfectly on any Roku device; in fact it's better than the IR remote that ships with your Roku box because it uses WiFi. I can pause, skip intros, select menu items, or even change the channel from anywhere in my house

author: Mary Swirsky
comment: We lost our remote. This solved the problem. the only downside is I have to unlock my phone then use it, which makes it hard to skip past unsuspected bad parts.

author: Eve Fields
comment: It works! Our roku remotes have all died in the past couple of months and we were having trouble figuring out anything to get them to wprk and i had tried befpreto download a remote ap didnt yhi k there was one yet but there is and i love it because it works!!!

author: Justin Lafontaine
comment: Forced to pay to do anything except use the arrows even to turn up the volume of MY tv. I do not recomend downloading

author: Desiree Trostel
comment: Works well and works instantly. I can stop searching for the damn remote.

author: Marlie Hopkins
comment: Does not work. Makes clicking noises, but controls don't work. Pulls up the channels, but you have to pay to access them.

author: pixel craft
comment: GET THE ACTUAL APP THIS APP SUCKS JUST CRASHES  ALL THE TUME

author: Nicole Lemanski
comment: I have a TCL TV. Best roku app I've found for it, I just worn it had a power app. I do really like that I can control both my roku and TV with the upgrade.

author: John Garfield
comment: Who cares. It sucks and you pay to open parts others have for free. Lame money grubbers.
Love app works great for both rokus I have 1 HD  1 regular and works on both. Sometimes it won't connect but that's not a big deal I open the main rokus app and reprogram it for my device

author: Venus Childress
comment: I would probably give this a much higher score if it would turn on my Roku television. Otherwise it works fine, as long as my vpn is turned off.

author: Danny Cole
comment: App keeps freezing up but otherwise it's ok.
OMG this Roku remote is working on my tv at the first day. I am impressed with this tv Roku remote control. This is loading all program up on home screen same. Thanks. I gave you a rate 5.

author: Gregory Lane
comment: Sucks on Netflix hit direction pad once and it scrolls 3 to 6 times

author: Devon Wilson
comment: This thing sucks that's all I have to say《<○>¡<●>》

reply.author: TinyByte Apps
reply.content: Sorry to hear that Devon, could you email me suggestions for how I can improve my app? -tinybyteapps@gmail.com

author: Eric Green
comment: Works flawlessly, better than the actual remote. Only recommendation would be to swap the directions for the swipe feature; when I swipe right, I'm used to how a phone does it, not swipe right to move the curser right.

author: Leona Kimber
comment: Very handy, we lost our remote.

author: Kalindi Bhide
comment: My Tony remote broke so I use this app and it works!

author: Nikk Nack
comment: I want to use the app but it requires an IP address but how am I supposed to get that if I don't have a remote ? 🤔 there should be an alternate way because most would download this app because they don't have a remote .

reply.author: TinyByte Apps
reply.content: The app finds your Roku automatically. It's only when your network has an issue that you need to enter the IP address manually.

author: Jaci Basco
comment: I paid for the volume control and cannot figure out how to use it? It just keeps taking me to the purchase page to purchase the other features and I tried to Google it but can't find anything on it. Help please.

author: Jan Morrida
comment: Ripped off! I request a refund, this app doesn't work at all!

author: michelle rivera
comment: My roku remote broke this is hands down the best thing I found that cost nothing!

author: Jessie Lynch
comment: Wi-Fi only? Why does a remote need only Wi-Fi? Really stupid I have limited Wi-Fi so wish I could give 0 stars

reply.author: TinyByte Apps
reply.content: Wi-Fi is the only way for a phone to communicate with Rokus. That's not something I or any other app maker can change.

comment: Instead of wasting money on batteries for your remote. Use this app instead.

It's cat's meow.better then sliced bread.every time any nudity or just a lil nipple wife wants turn off t.v!yeah fine have go head use piss me off cuz me a man & yes luv the nipple but now he'll I just pause the s.o.b till gets turned back on WHOOT-EHOO!!!!

author: randy butcher
comment: I went thru the process,then i got rejected.
